name: The Galaxy Spaceship with Aliens and Animals/\.
name_original: The Galaxy Spaceship with Aliens and Animals/\.
description: This game is about a human spaceship fighting safari animals and aliens. The controls are the arrow keys. To shoot use space bar. To spawn follower press the S key. Your shield will automatically turn itself on. BEWARE!!! Some aliens have a small target in them, you need to shoot them, dead center. Some aliens are small and don't more, but some are fast and are tiny.
